ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> My enchantress friend and I are searching for the Siryn Hair Hood (AC 5, +13
> Charisma, +10 Resistance to Fire. All/ALL). Does anyone have an idea where
> this could be found? I have heard both Rathe Mountains and Ocean of Tears.
> Any help would be appreciated.












S
p
o
i
l
e
r

Space




The spoiler space wasn't needed really, because I don't have a definate answer,
but one thing I know pretty darn well is the Ocean of Tears. This item, if it
comes from there, must be off a very rare NPC that I have never seen, and I've
seen some NPCs that most people probably don't even know are in the OOT like
Gull Skytalon, Mojo the Tainted and the rare wandering sister of erollisi Naya
Driftwood who drops the equally rare "Purity Belt".

(joking about the rarity of the purity belt)

There ARE sirens in the OOT though, but they've never dropped this item as far
as I know.

Jyzan
